title: People like you
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Canada - Armed forces
Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Armed forces - procurement
description: A recruiting film of general interest, People Like You introduces its audience to members of the Canadian Armed Forces Reserves, who serve as a volunteer force both at home and abroad. They engage in a variety of activities, such as providing civilian rescue services, patrolling the environment, evacuating the sick, and other public assistance functions.
